Module.name: VPDDGEO2
Module.comment: is the StartDet and pipe support hardware

Document.Module:
AGECOM GCUNIT GCONST
VPDD,VPBP,VPBO,VPBA,VPBB,VPBX,VFEE,VLEM,VPIP,VPFP,VPFA,VPFB,VPFC,VPBI,VPST,VPSC,VPSA,VPSB,VPSV,VPSW,VRNG,VSEC,VDET,VXST,VCNV,VPMT,VRAD,VPCL,VPCF,VPCV,VPCH,VDTI,IBEM,IBEH,IBEV,IBEW,IBSA,IBSB,IBSC,IBSD,IBSE,IBSF,IBSG,IBSH,IBAA,IBAB,IBAC,IBST,IBBC,IBCC
ybase,ytop,convlength,detangle,strutheight,ydispl
xloc,yloc,zloc,zpos,tempos
zpose,zposw,EWshift,UDshift,BoltShift,locang,phiang,detzint
isec
kDetStyle,kIBeamStyle
kDetStyle = 0
zposE = vpdg_zposEast zposW = vpdg_zposWest EWshift = vpdg_EWShift UDshift = vpdg_UDShift BoltShift = vpdg_BoltShift
kDetStyle = 1
zposE = vpdg_zposEast zposW = vpdg_zposWest EWshift = vpdg_EWShift UDshift = vpdg_UDShift BoltShift = vpdg_BoltShift
kDetStyle = 2
zposE = vpdh_zposEast zposW = vpdh_zposWest EWshift = vpdh_EWShift UDshift = vpdh_UDShift BoltShift = vpdh_BoltShift
zpos = zposW
zpos = zposE
kIBeamStyle=0
kIBeamStyle=1
kIBeamStyle=2
kIBeamStyle=3
tempos = (vpdg_IBposYc+vpdg_IBthickH+(vpdg_IBheight/2.))
ybase= vpdg_IBposYc - (vpdg_IBheight + vpdg_BPthick)/2 ytop = ybase + vpdg_BPthick/2+ vpdg_FPheight + vpdg_FPChght
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPwidth)/2 yloc=ybase+(vpdg_BPthick+vpdg_FPHhght)/2 zloc=(vpdg_BPlength-2*vpdg_FPthick-vpdg_FPHhght)/2
yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPAhght/2 zloc=(vpdg_BPlength - vpdg_FPthick)/2
xloc=(vpdg_FPAwidth+(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPAwidth-2*vpdg_FPwidth)/2)/2 yloc=(ytop - (vpdg_FPChght+vpdg_FPAhght)/4) zloc=(vpdg_BPlength - vpdg_FPthick)/2
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPwidth)/2 yloc=(ytop-(vpdg_FPChght+vpdg_FPwidth/2)/2) zloc=(vpdg_BPlength - vpdg_FPthick)/2
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_FPwidth)/2 yloc=(ybase+vpdg_BPthick/2+ vpdg_FPheight/2) zloc=(vpdg_BPlength-vpdg_FPthick)/2
strutheight = vpdg_STdiagsz/cos(vpdg_STangle*degrad) + vpdg_BPlength*tan(vpdg_STangle*degrad)
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth+vpdg_STthick)/2 yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPwidth-strutheight/2
xloc=(vpdg_BPwidth-vpdg_SCwidth)/2 yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPwidth-strutheight+vpdg_SCheight/2 zloc=(vpdg_BPlength+vpdg_SClength)/2
yloc=ytop-vpdg_FPwidth-vpdg_SCheight/2
ydispl=(vpdg_STdiagsz/(2*cos(vpdg_STangle*degrad))+vpdg_SCheight/2)/2
detangle=-30+isec*(360/vpdg_NumPMT)
detzint = -(VPDH_detlen/2.0)+VPDH_detfront+(VPDH_leadthick+vpdh_scintthick) locang=0.
locang=degrad*0. locang=ATAN((VPDH_ring1_rad)/(0.5*VPDH_zposWest+0.5*VPDH_zposEast+detzint))
phiang = degrad*(VPDH_ring1_phi0 + isec*VPDH_ring1_dphi) xloc = (VPDH_ring1_rad+0.5*VPDH_detlen*SIN(locang))*COS(phiang) yloc = (VPDH_ring1_rad+0.5*VPDH_detlen*SIN(locang))*SIN(phiang)
locang=0.
locang=degrad*4. locang=ATAN((VPDH_ring2_rad)/(0.5*VPDH_zposWest+0.5*VPDH_zposEast+detzint))
phiang = degrad*(VPDH_ring2_phi0 + isec*VPDH_ring2_dphi) xloc = (VPDH_ring2_rad+0.5*VPDH_detlen*SIN(locang))*COS(phiang) yloc = (VPDH_ring2_rad+0.5*VPDH_detlen*SIN(locang))*SIN(phiang)
locang=0.
locang=degrad*8. locang=ATAN((VPDH_ring3_rad)/(0.5*VPDH_zposWest+0.5*VPDH_zposEast+detzint))
phiang = degrad*(VPDH_ring3_phi0 + isec*VPDH_ring3_dphi) xloc = (VPDH_ring3_rad+0.5*VPDH_detlen*SIN(locang))*COS(phiang) yloc = (VPDH_ring3_rad+0.5*VPDH_detlen*SIN(locang))*SIN(phiang)
ydispl=vpdg_DETrad - sqrt(vpdg_DETrad*vpdg_DETrad - (vpdg_CLwidth/2-vpdg_CLthick)*(vpdg_CLwidth/2-vpdg_CLthick))
convlength=vpdg_ConvThk+vpdg_RadiThk
